name: Course Learning Outcome Evaluation
description: The Course Learning Outcome Evaluation (CLOE) data set returns the learner's outcomes for required competencies. Data comes from the Competencies tool, not the Learning Outcomes tool. Required Config Variable d2l.Tools.AdvancedDataSets.ProgramOrgUnitTypeId (set the org unit type ID that represents a program for an org) Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute CLOE (Organization level)

columns.name: Program Enrollment
columns.description: Ancestor of the course template defined in columns (Org Unit ID, Org Unit Name, and Org Unit Code). Where multiple ancestors exist, all ancestors are displayed in the field, using '|" as a delimiter. The Org Unit Type to use as the parent is defined as a configuration variable.

columns.name: Org Unit Id
columns.description: Org unit ID used to collect learning outcomes.

columns.name: Org Unit Name
columns.description: Name of the course template used to collect results.

columns.name: Org Unit Code
columns.description: Code of the course template used to collect results.

columns.name: Org Unit Type Id
columns.description: ID of the course template.

columns.name: Org Unit Type Name
columns.description: "Course Template".

columns.name: Outcome Id
columns.description: ID of the learning objective in the course template.

columns.name: Outcome Type
columns.description: Learning objective.

columns.name: Outcome Name
columns.description: Name of the learning objective.

columns.name: Ready For Evaluation
columns.description: Possible status' for learning objectives:

columns.name: Course Offering Id
columns.description: OU ID for the course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Code
columns.description: Code for the course offering.

columns.name: Semester Name
columns.description: Semester that the course offering belongs to.

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: First name of the learner.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: Last name of the learner.

columns.name: Username
columns.description: Learner's username.

columns.name: Org Defined Id
columns.description: Learner's org defined ID.

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: Learner's unique numeric D2L ID.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: Role name of the learner in the specified org unit.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: D2L ID of the learner's role in the specified org unit.

columns.name: Activity Id
columns.description: ID of the activity that the outcome is attached to.

columns.name: Activity Type
columns.description: Type of activity that the outcome is attached to:

columns.name: Activity Name
columns.description: Name of the activity, for example, content topic name, dropbox name, quiz name, or quiz question name. Note: If the activity is a quiz question, then the quiz name must be included too.

columns.name: Assessment Type
columns.description: Numeric or Rubric (or blank if it is not assessed)

columns.name: Rubric Id
columns.description: If the outcome is assessed by a rubric, this is the rubric ID.

columns.name: Rubric Name
columns.description: If the outcome is assessed by a rubric, this is the rubric name.

columns.name: Rubric Measurement
columns.description: If the outcome is assessed by a rubric, this contains Overall Score or the specific rubric criterion used to measure the outcome.

columns.name: Assessment Threshold
columns.description: If assessed, contains the threshold considered to be successful attainment.

columns.name: Assessment Threshold Criteria
columns.description: For numeric assessments, this field contains one of the following operators associated with the threshold:

columns.name: Rubric Level Achieved
columns.description: If the activity is assessed by a rubric, this is the level that the learner achieved. If the rubric measurement is Overall Score, this is the learner's overall score on the rubric. If the Rubric Measurement is a specific criterion, this is how the learner performed on that criterion.

columns.name: Rubric Points
columns.description: If the activity is assessed by a rubric, this is the point score that the learner achieved. If the rubric measurement is Overall Score, this is the learner's overall score on the rubric. If the Rubric Measurement is a specific criterion, this is how the learner performed on that criterion.

columns.name: Activity Grade Points
columns.description: Achieved points value the learner received when the activity is assessed by Grade.

columns.name: Activity Grade Max Points
columns.description: Total possible points the learner could receive for the activity when the activity is assessed by Grade.

columns.name: Activity Grade Percent
columns.description: Activity grade as recorded in the grade book.

columns.name: Activity Threshold Achieved
columns.description: If this outcome is assessed, it is a comparison of the assessment threshold to the learner results.
